import hello.core.AutoAppConfig;
import hello.core.member.MemberService;
import org.junit.jupiter.api.Test;
import org.springframework.context.ApplicationContext;
import org.springframework.context.annotation.AnnotationConfigApplicationContex;
import static org.assertj.core.api.Assertions.*;

public class AutoAppConfigTest {
	@Test
    void basicScan() {
		ApplicationContext ac = new
		AnnotationConfigApplicationContext(AutoAppConfig.class);
        
		MemberService memberService = ac.getBean(MemberService.class);
	    assertThat(memberService).isInstanceOf(MemberService.class);
    }
}

π¥Β ν•΄κ²°μ±…

μ¶”κ°€ κΈ°λ¥λ³„λ΅ κ°λ³„μ μΈ ν΄λμ¤λ¥Ό μ„¤κ³„ β†’ κΈ°λ¥μ„ μ΅°ν•©ν•  λ• ν΄λμ¤μ κ°μ²΄λ¥Ό μ΄μ© μ¶”κ°€ κΈ°λ¥μ μκ°€ λ§μ„μλ΅ ν¨κ³Όκ°€ ν° μ„¤κ³„ (2μ nμ κ³± β†’ n+2)

κΈ°λ³Έμ μΌλ΅ μ κ³µν•λ” λ„λ΅ ν‘μ‹ κΈ°λ¥μ€ RoadDisplay ν΄λμ¤μ draw λ©”μ„λ“λ¥Ό νΈμ¶ λ”°λΌμ„ μ°¨μ„  ν‘κΈ°μ™€, κµν†µλ‰ ν‘κΈ° κΈ°λ¥μ€ RoadDisplay κ°μ²΄ μ°Έμ΅°κ°€ ν•„μ” (draw λ©”μ„λ“ μ¤λ²„λΌμ΄λ“) β†’ μƒμ„ ν΄λμ¤μΈ DisplayDecorator ν΄λμ¤μ—μ„ Display ν΄λμ¤λ΅μ μ»΄ν¬μ§€μ… κ΄€κ³„λ¥Ό ν†µν•΄ ν‘ν„

public abstract class Display{
	public abstract void draw();
}

public abstract class DisplayDecorator extends Display{
	private Display decoratedDisplay;

	public DisplayDecorator(Display decoratedDisplay){
		this.decoratedDisplay = decoratedDisplay;
	}
	public void draw(){
		decoratedDisplay.draw();
	}
}

μ°¨μ„ ν‘κΈ°μ™€ κµν†µλ‰ ν‘κΈ° κΈ°λ¥ μ΅°ν•© κµ¬ν„

public class Client {
	public static void main(String[] args){

		Display roadWithLandAndTraffic = 
			new TrafficDecorator(new LaneDecorator(new RoadDisplay()));

		roadWithLandAndTraffic.draw();

	}
}

π¥Β λ°μ»¤λ μ΄ν„° ν¨ν„΄

λ°μ»¤λ μ΄ν„° ν¨ν„΄μ€ κΈ°λ³Έ κΈ°λ¥μ— μ¶”κ°€ν•  μ μλ” κΈ°λ¥ μΆ…λ¥κ°€ λ§μ€ κ²½μ° κ° μ¶”κ°€ κΈ°λ¥μ„ Decorator ν΄λμ¤λ΅ μ •μ ν• ν›„ ν•„μ”ν• Decorator κ°μ²΄λ¥Ό μ΅°ν•©ν•¨μΌλ΅μ¨ μ¶”κ°€ κΈ°λ¥μ μ΅°ν•©μ„ μ„¤κ³„ν•λ” λ°©μ‹ Decorator κ°μ²΄ μ΅°ν•©μ„ ν”„λ΅κ·Έλλ° μ‹¤ν–‰ μ¤‘ λ™μ μΌλ΅ μƒμ„±

public class Client {
	public static void main(String[] args){

		Display road = new RoadDisplay();
		
		for(String decoratorName: args){
			if(decoratorName.equalsIgnoreCase("Lane"))
				road = new LaneDecorator(road);
			if(decoratorName.equalsIgnoreCase("Traffic"))
				road = new TrafficDecorator(road);
			if(decoratorName.equalsIgnoreCase("Crossing"))
				road = new CrossingDecorator(road);
		}
		road.draw();
	}
}
